Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring water tank inspectors to submit annual inspection reports directly to the department of health and mental hygiene
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring water tank inspectors to submit annual inspection reports directly to the department of health and mental hygiene.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to conduct periodic inspections of water tanks and to post the results online

Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to conduct periodic inspections of water tanks and to post the results online.

Items.Title: A Local Law to the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of health and mental hygiene to review documentation of annual inspections of water tanks where harmful bacteria are found, and to post the results online
